mapper.select: SELECT i.*, ex.WERKS WERKS, ex.RESLO RESLO, m.BASE_UNIT BASE_UNIT, i.INCRE_QTY + i.QTY SUM_QTY FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o ON i.ORDER_DATE = o.ORDER_DATE AND i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO JOIN t_md_branch b ON b.BRANCH_NO = o.BRANCH_NO JOIN t_md_mara m ON m.MATNR = i.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = b.SALES_ORG JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex ON m.MATNR = ex.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = ex.MATNR
